thread.title: Raider basketball alum Dylan Edgar signs with Canada’s Niagara River Lions
thread.title_full: Raider basketball alum Dylan Edgar signs with Canada’s Niagara River Lions

author: Courtesy of SU Sports Information
title: Raider basketball alum Dylan Edgar signs with Canada’s Niagara River Lions
text:
PHOTO BY BILL SLATTERY Edgar 
SU basketball standout Dylan Edgar scored 1,199 points and grabbed 722 rebounds in his time with the Raiders.   Raider basketball alum Dylan Edgar signs with Canada’s Niagara River Lions Courtesy of SU Sports Information   
The Niagara River Lions of the National Basketball League of Canada have announced the signing of former Shippensburg University men's basketball standout Dylan Edgar. 
Edgar will compete for a spot on the River Lions squad, beginning with training camp on December 1. The 2015-2016 campaign will be the inaugural season for the River Lions as they will compete in the NBL of Canada's Central Division. kAmQxE H2D 2? 23D@=FE6 A=62DFC6 E@ 4@249 sJ=2?j E96 $9:AA6?D3FC8 q2D<6E32== 72>:=J 2?5 x 4@F=5?VE 36 >@C6 92AAJ 7@C 9:>[Q D2:5 $& 9625 4@249 r9C:D u:E6] Qw:D 92C5 H@C< 2?5 565:42E:@? 92G6 A2:5 @77j 96 H2D @?6 @7 E96 E@A A=2J6CD :? @FC 4@?76C6?46[ 96 :D =62G:?8 $wx!
